Data from the World Health Organization: NCDC) show that new cases have been reported every week in Nigeria since February 27, contradicting the claim that Nigeria is COVID-19 free.
The article by US: based website Black Culture News falsely alleged that Nigeria is one of the countries that is coronavirus-free.
The article was shared multiple times on: accumulating over 14,000 shares, indicating its widespread dissemination.
As of April 3: 2020, Nigeria had reported 190 confirmed COVID-19 cases, with 20 recoveries and two deaths, providing concrete evidence that the claim of being COVID-19 free is false.
